comments:
org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.archive.operations.EarComponentLoadStrategyImpl.a
ddModulesAndUtilities() throws NPE when dynamic project is created with auto-
build option.

To reproduce this problem,
1. set auto-build option on.
2. create dynamic project with default option.
3. then NPE is thrown.

Here is the console log.
*** ERROR ***: Mon Sep 05 14:23:54 JST 2005    java.lang.NullPointerException
